description:
Thom is a laid-back kind of guy who loves to work out and maintain his body…and, he has one thick dick!
“So Thom, what turns you on?”
“A lot of things! I’m 20 years old, so it’s pretty easy to get aroused.”
“So, basically your dick is always hard?”
“Yeah, pretty much!”
With a dick like his, I’m sure nobody complains!
title: Thom
